item.description:
Parker Wheeler's Blues Party at The Grog in Newburyport will feature Alizon Lissance, Myanna, Ed Scheer, Amadee Castenell, Greg Holt,Â  and Mike Duke on Sunday, May 5.

Cover: $7

Come join us at 7PM for an evening of live music and dancing, and enjoy a drink or two to close the weekend on the right note and with lots of energy. Hope to see you there!

Instructions to find us: Walk inside the Grog and go left around the bar. There will be a guy sitting on a stool at the top of a staircase. Give him your money and let him stamp your hand. Go downstairs. We usually hang around near the dance floor.

The Grog's website: http://thegrog.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Pay the cover, go downstairs and look for me. I look like my pic.
item.name: Parker Wheeler's Blues Party at The Grog featuring Alizon Lissance
